projects.title: Anon Images
projects.description: A platform to Share, Like, Browse, and Download images with the community!

projects.title: snackOverflow
projects.description: snackOverflow is a web application that helps people who are returning to the office make new friendships and connections over a shared meal. Users can swap and share their food, and can leave anonymous comments on other people's posts to let them know they are interested in sharing their snack. Developed in a day and a half for SAP's 2022 Hackathon.

projects.title: Animal Hustler
projects.description: A game where you feed as many cows as possible before the timer runs out! Your parents have left town and have left you in charge of running the family farm for three months. The good news is that you keep the profits of whatever you earn! Can you make enough tuition and pocket money to attend school in the fall? Move your avatar around the map using W,A,S,D controls and run into a cow to feed it. The faster you feed it, the more coins you get! Beware of nasty surprises if you don't feed a cow in time. As the game progresses, cows will spawn faster and faster. Try and feed them all!

projects.title: Outliner
projects.description: A discord bot that answers questions from BCIT course outlines using OpenAI's answer API. The bot must be provided with a list of links for the course outlines, and then initialized before being used. Initializing the bot will run the scraper module which scrapes the web pages of the course outlines for useful data. The data is then converted in to a text file which then goes to the ai_answers module, where the OpenAI works on the collected data and provides suitable answers to the questions. Finally, the discord bot is used a user interface to ask and answer the questions.

projects.title: DeskBuddy
projects.description: A mobile-first web app designed to remind and guide users to take breaks.

projects.title: Wrath of the Necromancer
projects.description: A MUD-type game that focuses on an adventurer seeking to avenge their village after the atrocities commited by the necromancer of the land. You will start weak, explore the wilderness, fight various enemies, level up, explore new areas, and collect useful doodads along the way. Find the necromancer and end his tryanny.

projects.title: Image Recognition Game Bot
projects.description: A fun project I made in my free time experimenting with OpenCV Image Recognition. It trains on images and plays games automatically at inhuman levels
